code: import React from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{addTodo}from'../actions';var AddTodo=function AddTodo(_ref){var dispatch=_ref.dispatch;var input;return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement("form",{onSubmit:function onSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();if(!input.value.trim()){return;}dispatch(addTodo(input.value));input.value='';}},React.createElement("input",{ref:function ref(node){return input=node;}}),React.createElement("button",{type:"submit"},"Add Todo")));};export default connect()(AddTodo);
